xwikidoc.name: CheckAccountCreation

xwikidoc.content: {pre} #set($email = $request.email) #set($account = $request.account) #set($login = $request.login) { #if($account) #set($queryAccount = " and obj.name<>'$account' ") #end #set($query = ",BaseObject as obj, StringProperty as prop where doc.fullName=obj.name and obj.className='XWiki.XWikiUsers' and obj.id=prop.id.id and prop.id.name='email' and prop.value='$email' $!queryAccount") ##$query ###foreach ($docfound in $xwiki.searchDocuments($query)) ## * $docfound ###end "email":#if($xwiki.searchDocuments($query).size()>0)false#else true#end #if($login) #set($query = ",BaseObject as obj where doc.name='$login' and doc.fullName=obj.name and obj.className='XWiki.XWikiUsers'") ,"login":#if($xwiki.searchDocuments($query).size()>0)false#else true#end #end } {/pre}
